title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 865.2 - Designated waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 865.2 - Designated waters

State Regulations

The Hackensack River-Saddle River and Greenwood

Lake-Sterling Lake drainage basin shall be deemed to include the following
areas: All land and water areas, the natural surface drainage from which is
directly or indirectly tributary to the Hackensack River-Saddle River and

Greenwood Lake-Sterling Lake. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
865.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
